MODPACK.NONE: You have not yet created a modpack. Do it by clicking on the New Modpack button to the left.

MISSING.NAME: Modpack name is missing.
MISSING.MINECRAFT_VERSION: Modpack minecraft version has not been specified.

UPDATE.AVAILABLE: A new update is available. Downloading now...
UPDATE.DOWNLOADED: A new update has been downloaded. Restart the application to update.
UPDATE.NOT_AVAILABLE: Not updates available, running latest version.
